= Eventlist Shortcode Display Options =
_Shortcode options are listed in the following format_
<br>*option* = "sample value" `[` *default* | valid input type `]`

  # *categories* = "1,2,3" `[` *all* | one or more comma separated category ids `]`
<br>Display only events associated with listed [#Category_IDs category ids*]

  # *excluded* = true `[` *false* | true `]`
<br>Display only events NOT associated with categories listed in the categories parameter

  # *start* = "2011-07-10" `[` "*today*" | [#Available_Date_Inputs Available Date Inputs] `]`
<br>Display events starting on or after the specified date

  # *end* = "tomorrow" `[` *"+1 year"* | [#Available_Date_Inputs Available Date Inputs] `]`
<br>Display events ending on or before the specified date

  # *limit* = 5 `[` *15* | integer `]`
<br>Limit events displayed to the specified integer

  # *whitelabel* = true `[` *false* | true `]`
<br>Display events without colors

  # *reverse* = false `[` *false* | true `]`
<br>Display events in reverse order

  # *noresults* = "Nada" `[` *"No Upcoming Events"* | text `]`
<br>Display specified text when no events are returned

= Available Date Inputs =
  # {{{YYYY-MM-DD}}}
    * 2010-10-10
    * 2011-01-01
  # `[` (+/-)1-9 | next | last | today | tomorrow | yesterday `]` `[` days | week/s | month/s | year/s `]`
    * today
    * tomorrow
    * yesterday
    * last week
    * next month
    * +3 days
    * +2 weeks
    * -2 months
    * -3 years

= Examples =
_All examples are based on hypothetical categories 1, 2, 3 and 4_
  # Display categories 1, 2 and 4, beginning in the last 7 days, ending today (default), listed in reverse order, limited to the last 10 events
{{{
[eventlist categories="1,2,4" start="last week" limit=10 reverse=true]
}}}
  # Display category


= Category IDs =
Category ids are listed on the plugin's Manage Categories page
